name: Christmas Thief
description:
Hohoho, this year we'll ruin Christmas!

In this endless runner you are the Grinch and try to steal as many presents as you can, but don't get caught by Santa Claus and his little helpers. Are you fast enough? Do you finally ruin christmas this year? 

Find out in "Christmas Thief" 

Good Luck and a happy not christmas!

 

Controls

Jump over obstacles with SPACE or W

Get a boost by collecting a gingerbread man

Creators

We are a team of four htk students and this game is our try to win the htk GameJam 2022 - Ice Edition. 

Theme: "You are the enemy"

Criss - Level Design & Programming

Ricky - Sounds & Pixelart

Leoni - Pixelart

Alina - UI & Pixelart

Credits

Jingle Bells - Christmas in 8 bit by The greenRiverThriller

Carol of the Bells by 40Nix

Font - Rectaxel Bold
